content: Write your Senators and Reps LETTERS, call them, show up at their offices (they are LEGALLY REQUIRED TO ADMIT YOU)! Flood their offices with mail and phone calls. SHAME THEM! THREATEN THEM! VOTE AGAINST THEM!!! THEY ARE HERE FOR US! WE ARE NOT HERE FOR THEM!!!!! http://www.house.gov/representatives/ https://www.senate.gov/
